entry.title: On consensus changes in bitcoin 2024
entry.summary: The message conveys a sense of concern and perplexity regarding a certain subject where the sender identifies a blind spot in the recipient's understanding. Despite acknowledging the recipient as a relatively smart software engineer, the sender is puzzled by the recipient's position or lack of insight into a particular issue. The sender speculates on potential causes for this oversight, such as echo chambers, stubbornness, or self-interest obscuring the broader system perspective. Additionally, the sender touches upon the challenge of discerning between incompetence and ill-intent when evaluating actions or opinions. The sender concludes by stepping away from the discussion, indicating a decision to not further engage on the topic at hand.
